input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
This Downswept Douglas tree features Feel Real branch tip technology, creating a tree with remarkable realism. These crush-resistant branch tips are molded from real tree branches for an authentic living tree appearance. This tree is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy metal tree stand is included.

This Downswept Douglas Fir Full Pre-Lit Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6.5 feet tall with a 49 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of Feel Real individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and fee
Features 650 clear lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on the tree before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Silverado Slim Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International 4.5' Pre-Lit Franklin Fir Pencil Tree'
  - Name='AAZJ 6-Feet Spruce Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Lightshare 6 ft. Lighted Oak Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 7-ft Douglas fir Pre-lit Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights T1892'
  - Name='Forclover 6-Feet Pre-lit Artificial Christmas Tree with Yellow LED Lights HYFASDCM37'
  - Name='National Tree Company 9ft. Pre-Lit Decorator Tree'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 5' Fraser Fir "Natural Look" Artificial Christmas Tree with 200 Clear LED Lights, a Burlap Base and 853 Bendable Branches'
  - Name='WELLFOR 7-Feet Pre-lit Flocked Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights HYJ23570US'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Noble Fir Narrow Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Stratford Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company Carolina Pine Tree'
  - Name='AAZJ 4-Feet Fir Pre-lit Pencil White Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights NBC-CM64209UL'
  - Name='WELLFOR 8-Feet Pre-lit Flocked Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights CM-HWY-23444US'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Alpine Balsam Fir Tree Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Vancouver Spruce Tree Traditional 6 ft Green'
  - Name='Balsam Hill California Baby Redwood Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Balsam Fir Flip Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Silverado Slim Renew Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International 6 ft. Pre-Lit Twig Tree with 240 White LED Twinkle Lights'
  - Name='SINOFURN 6-Feet Artificial Christmas Tree SYA720011GN'
  - Name='National Tree Company Lit White Winchester Pine Christmas Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar type of premium artificial Christmas tree with realistic branch construction, but different fir species (Fraser Fir vs Douglas Fir) and potentially different branch technology.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Silverado Slim Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial Christmas tree with realistic features but distinctly slim silhouette unlike the full downswept shape of reference. Different brand and shape.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 4.5' Pre-Lit Franklin Fir Pencil Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial tree but pencil shape and smaller height make it less similar in construction and appearence to the downswept, fuller reference tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: AAZJ 6-Feet Spruce Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar height and pre-lit artificial tree; however, spruce species and likely different branch tip technology reduces direct similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lightshare 6 ft. Lighted Oak Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit artificial tree but oak species is less typical for Christmas trees and likely a different silhouette and branch texture from Douglas Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 7-ft Douglas fir Pre-lit Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights T1892
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Very similar species (Douglas Fir) and pre-lit artificial tree with similar height; slight difference with LED color and possibly brand technology.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Forclover 6-Feet Pre-lit Artificial Christmas Tree with Yellow LED Lights HYFASDCM37
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit Christmas tree similar height but unspecified species and yellow LED lights differ from clear lights. Less certainty on branch tip realism.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 9ft. Pre-Lit Decorator Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and pre-lit artificial tree with larger height; however, no mention of downswept Douglas Fir or specialized branch tips reduces similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 5' Fraser Fir "Natural Look" Artificial Christmas Tree with 200 Clear LED Lights, a Burlap Base and 853 Bendable Branches
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different species (Fraser Fir), smaller size, and fewer lights than reference; still a natural-look artificial pre-lit tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: WELLFOR 7-Feet Pre-lit Flocked Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights HYJ23570US
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar size and pre-lit, but flocked finish and unspecified tree species differ from downswept Douglas Fir with clear lights.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Noble Fir Narrow Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Premium Noble Fir tree with narrow silhouette; different species and shape compared to the fuller downswept Douglas Fir reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Stratford Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Artificial spruce tree; species and branch construction likely differ from Douglas Fir, but similar category of high-quality artificial trees.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Carolina Pine Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand but pine species and likely different silhouette and branch tip technology reduce direct similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: AAZJ 4-Feet Fir Pre-lit Pencil White Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights NBC-CM64209UL
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Fir species but pencil shape, much shorter height, and white LEDs provide lower similarity to downswept, full, pre-lit Douglas Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: WELLFOR 8-Feet Pre-lit Flocked Artificial Christmas Tree with White LED Lights CM-HWY-23444US
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar features of height and pre-lit design, but flocked finish and unspecified species reduce resemblance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Alpine Balsam Fir Tree Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Realistic green artificial fir tree, close in category but different fir species and brand compared to downswept Douglas Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Vancouver Spruce Tree Traditional 6 ft Green
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Traditional spruce tree of similar height but species and potentially branch construction differ.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill California Baby Redwood Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Redwood species and smaller/baby size differ significantly from full-size downswept Douglas Fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Balsam Fir Flip Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Balsam Fir species and flip branch design differ from downswept Douglas Fir hinged branches, but still a similar category of artificial tree.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Silverado Slim Renew Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim silhouette and brand differ from the downswept full Douglas Fir, though both are realistic artificial trees.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International 6 ft. Pre-Lit Twig Tree with 240 White LED Twinkle Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Twig tree with different construction style and fewer lights, though similar height and pre-lit feature.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: SINOFURN 6-Feet Artificial Christmas Tree SYA720011GN
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Generic artificial 6-foot Christmas tree, likely pre-lit, but no details on species or technology reduces similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company Lit White Winchester Pine Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and pre-lit but different pine species with white lights instead of clear, differing in branch and light style.
